ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We are enough for you against the mockers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We are surely sufficient to deal with those who scoff at you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely We suffice to deal with those who scoff at you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We shall help you against those who mock you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed We suffice you against these mockers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Truly, We will suffice you against the mockers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We will suffice you against the scoffers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We suffice thee against the mockers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We defend thee from the scoffers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We will, surely, suffice you against those who mock,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We will suffice unto thee against the mockers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed We will suffice you against the deriders
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For sufficient are We unto thee against those who scoff,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Truly! We will suffice you against the scoffers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We suffice you against those who mock,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We are enough for you against the mockers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:95] Indeed We have sufficed you against the mockers, [who mocked] you, by Our having destroyed each one of them through some harm, and these were: al-Walīd b. al-Mughīra, al-‘Āsī b. Wā’il, ‘Udayy b. Qays, al-Aswad b. al-Muttalib and al-Aswad b. ‘Abd Yaghūth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! We defend thee from the scoffers) We have lifted from you the burden of those who deride you,
